newsitem.title: USA: D&P upgrades Travelers Property ratings.
newsitem.headline: D&P upgrades Travelers Property ratings.

text.p: Duff & Phelps Credit Rating Co said Wednesday it has upgraded certain Travelers Property Casualty Corp's pooled and non-pooled insurance company subsidiaries' claims-paying ability ratings.

It acted following Travelers Property Casualty's obtaining final regulatory approvals in March to combine its two formerly separate intercompany pools into a single reinsurance pool known as Travelers Property Casualty Pool.

In the Travelers Property Casualty Pool, Duff & Phelps raised to Double A Minus from Single A Plus the rating of former Aetna Property Casualty pool members. Among non-pool companies, it raised the rating to Double A Minus from Single A Plus on Aetna Casualty and Surety Co of America.
Travelers Property Casualty is an 82 percent owned subsidiary of Travelers Group Inc. It was formed in April 1996 through the merger of Travelers' and Aetna Inc's property-casualty business.
